host.title: Hostname
host.description: Hostname or IP of the SMTP Server

from.title: From
from.description: Email address used as From value

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Does the SMTP server requires authentication

startTls.title: Start TLS
startTls.description: Does the SMTP server uses StartTLS

sslTrust.title: SSL Trust
sslTrust.description: Trusted domains. If set to "*", all hosts are trusted. If set to a whitespace separated list of hosts, those hosts are trusted.(ex: smtp.gmail.com)

sslProtocols.title: SSL Protocols
sslProtocols.description: SSL protocols that are enabled for SSL connections. Must be a whitespace separated list of protocols.(ex: TLSv1 TLSv1.1)
